nodes.text: Randy Jonsson was an assistant cameraman for Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure and Ewoks: The Battle for Endor. Additionally, he served as a matchmover for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.

He also worked on several other Lucasfilm productions, including Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (as assistant cameraman), Labyrinth (matte photographer) and Willow (as assistant cameraman and matte photographer).
